document.full_text: derrick rose, 22, became the youngest player to win the n.b.a.'s most valuable player award, and is the only bull to do so other than michael jordan.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: bulls' rose becomes youngest most valuable player
lines_and_colors: derrick rose, 22, became the youngest player to win the n.b.a.'s most valuable player award, and is the only bull to do so other than michael jordan.
